trans-unit.source: A token handler for encrypted security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 암호화된 보안 토큰에 대한 토큰 처리기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.

A token handler that serializes and deserializes <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedData>` elements and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedKey>` elements as defined in the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210).
trans-unit.target: 직렬화 및 역직렬화 하는 토큰 처리기 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken> 에서 개체를 `<xenc:EncryptedData>` 요소 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> 에서 개체를 `<xenc:EncryptedKey>` XML 암호화 구문 및 처리 사양에 정의 된 대로 요소 (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityTokenHandler" /> class.
An XML reader positioned at the start element.
The reader should not be advanced.

Returns a value that indicates whether the current XML element is pointing to an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element that can be deserialized to a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 XML 요소가 이 인스턴스에서 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />로 deserialize할 수 있는 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 요소를 가리키는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML reader is positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element as defined in section 3.5.1 of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 판독기가 XML 암호화 구문 및 처리 사양(http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210))의 3.5.1절에 정의된 대로 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 요소에 배치되었으면 <see langword="true" />, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The reader positioned at a security token (<see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.)
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰(<see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> 요소)에 있는 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the reader is pointing to an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 판독기가 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> 요소를 가리키는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 판독기가 <see langword="true" /> 요소에 배치되어 있으면 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Does not move the reader when it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 될 때 판독기를 이동 하지 않습니다 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handler provides serialization functionality for tokens.
trans-unit.target: 처리기가 토큰에 대한 serialization 기능을 제공하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handler can serialize tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 처리기가 토큰을 serialize할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
Gets the type identifier URIs for tokens handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에서 처리하는 토큰의 형식 식별자 URI를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, returns an array with a single <see langword="null" /> string because there is not a specific token type identifier that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> 형식과 연결된 특정 토큰 형식 식별자가 없기 때문에 기본적으로 단일 <see langword="null" /> 문자열이 포함된 배열을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> that will be used to serialize and deserialize key identifiers from the <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> 요소에서 키 식별자를 serialize 및 deserialize하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer that will be used to read and write key the key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 키 식별자를 읽고 쓰는 데 사용되는 토큰 serializer입니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
An XML reader positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element as defined in 'http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210'; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 판독기가 ‘http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210’에 정의된 대로 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 요소에 배치되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Reads an <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> from an XML stream.
A key identifier clause of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" />.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="reader" /> is not positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" />가 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 요소에 배치되지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: The reader from which to read the token.
Reads an encrypted security token.
A security token of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
There is no configured service token resolver.

(Either the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property or the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver" /> property of the referenced token handler configuration is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: (참조된 토큰 처리기 구성의 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 속성 또는 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver" /> 속성이 <see langword="null" />인 경우.

trans-unit.source: A service token resolver is required to obtain keys for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 토큰 확인자는 암호 해독을 위한 키를 얻는 데 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" /> referenced through the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> property is unable to find a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that can read the decrypted XML and return a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> 속성을 통해 참조된 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" />에서 암호 해독된 XML을 읽고 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />을 반환할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" />를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> is not found inside the XML pointed to by the reader.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />.

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> found inside the XML cannot be resolved by the configured service token resolver to a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 내부에서 발견된 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" />는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />에 대한 구성된 서비스 토큰 확인자를 통해 확인할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the token handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에서 처리되는 토큰 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The token type handled by the current instance.
The default is <see langword="typeof" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
The XML writer to which to write the encrypted token.
The encrypted security token, must be an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
Writes an encrypted security token using the XML writer.
trans-unit.target: XML 작성기를 사용하여 암호화된 보안 토큰을 작성합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="token" /> is not assignable as <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
This property is required for obtaining keys for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 암호화용 키를 얻는 데 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or-

The token handler collection returned by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> property was unable to find a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that can write the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> 속성에 의해 반환되는 토큰 처리기 컬렉션이 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> 속성에 의해 반환된 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />을 쓸 수 있는 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token" />를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials.SecurityKey" /> property is not assignable as <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />.
